h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Tiger’s Acolyte
content: It’s a bit of a riddle, but the “senior brother” was the First Prince of Flowing Sand that you fought in the Valley of Despair, who just happened to drop the Arhat Gold Piece. All that’s left is to bring it to the right place, which happens to be back where you first encountered the Boar Guai.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Yellow_Sand_Formation_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Yellow Sand Formation Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Windrest Hamlet' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Tiger’s Acolyte'.
The content is as follows:
It’s a bit of a riddle, but the “senior brother” was the First Prince of Flowing Sand that you fought in the Valley of Despair, who just happened to drop the Arhat Gold Piece. All that’s left is to bring it to the right place, which happens to be back where you first encountered the Boar Guai.
